page.title: 11PEOPLE OF GLENLUCE
page.content: The Parish of Old Luce has about{1640 people.The village of Glenluce has approximately{900}inhabitants.The local{Primary School}has a role of{106 which is declining like the population of the area.The school had about {170 pupils about{10 years}ago.Most of the new housing is for senior citizens,of whom there are many. The majority of the people in the area are working class,a small percentage are middle. Glenluce has 2{policemen}and an office in the village but both men work from Stranraer, so there is no local bobby as such. There is a {traffic}problem in the village and often radar patrol cars sit in wait for the unwary speeding motorist. {Vandalism }exists but it is not a serious problem. We have one resident {Justice of the {Peace, }
